subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lavelli, a Hall of Fame receiver nicknamed Gluefingers, helped the Cleveland Browns build a football dynasty with seven championships in the 1940s and ’50s.
snippet: Mr. Lavelli, a Hall of Fame receiver nicknamed Gluefingers, helped the Cleveland Browns build a football dynasty with seven championships in the 1940s and ’50s.
